25% Critical Strike Chance

Wrath and Ruin
On spell cast, gain 2.5% critical chance for 6 seconds, stacking up to 20%.

Salvage the Wreckage
Your spells have a chance equal to your crit chance to grant you or your targeted ally a shield for 0 for 3s.

4010.name: Bloodletter's Curse
4010.description:
60 Ability Power
30 Armor
30 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste

Vile Decay
Dealing magic damage reduces the target's magic resist by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to up to 30%. Repeat damage from the same spell cast can only stack this once per 2 second(s).
4010.plaintext: Grant Spell Shield after damaging an enemy with an ability

4011.name: Sword of Blossoming Dawn
4011.description:
30 Ability Power
200 Health
12% Heal and Shield Power
15 Ability Haste

Effervescence
Gain +1.2% Attack Speed for every 1% Heal and Shield Power you have.

Peppermint
On-Hit, heal the lowest health ally champion near you for [15 - 45] (+10% Bonus AD) (+7% AP), prioritizing lower health allies.

4015.name: Perplexity
4015.description:
60 Ability Power
5% Move Speed
22% Armor Penetration
30% Magic Penetration

Giant Slayer
Deal up to 22% bonus damage against champions with greater max Health than you.

Max damage increase reached when Health difference is greater than 2500.

4016.name: Wordless Promise
4016.description:
50 Ability Power
12% Heal and Shield Power
25 Ability Haste

Promise
Gain 20% of your Promised ally's Ability Power, and grant your Promised ally 20% of your Ability Haste.



ACTIVE (0s)
Promise
Make a Promise to an ally.

4017.name: Hellfire Hatchet
4017.description:
35 Attack Damage
12 Lethality
10% Omnivamp

Char
On-Hit, heal based on the Target's Current Health and apply a Burn that deals physical damage based on the Target's Missing Health per second for 4 seconds.

443054.name: Darksteel Talons
443054.description:
50% Attack Speed
55 Armor
10% Move Speed

Gash

443055.name: Fulmination
443055.description:
55 Attack Damage
45% Attack Speed
15% Move Speed

Polarity
On Attack, if the target is different from the target you most recently triggered an Energized Attack on, ready Energize.

Dynamo
Energized Attacks deal an additional magic damage based on the Target's Current Health.

443056.name: Demon King's Crown
443056.description:
Supremacy
Increases your Health, Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, Ability Power, Attack Speed, and Ability Haste by 26%, increased by 0% per round win and -3% each round lost after acquiring this item.

443058.name: Shield of Molten Stone
443058.description:
300 Health
100 Armor

Immovable as the Earth
Increase your armor by 20%, and gain Block Chance based on your Armor.

443059.name: Cloak of Starry Night
443059.description:
300 Health
100 Magic Resist

Limitless as the Stars
Increase your Magic Resist by 20%. Reduce all damage you take from non-Basic Attack sources by a percentage, scaling with your Magic Resist up to a cap of 50%.

443060.name: Sword of the Divine
443060.description:
110 Adaptive Force
40% Critical Strike Chance

Excoriate
Each Critical strike deals random bonus Critical Strike Damage, scaling up to 50% of your Critical Strike Chance.

443061.name: Force Of Entropy
443061.description:
900 Health
30 Ability Haste
25% Critical Strike Chance

Atrophy
Immobilizing Crowd Control effects you apply roll your Critical Chance to increase their duration by 0.25 +33% seconds.

443062.name: Sanguine Gift
443062.description:
80 Ability Power
20 Ability Haste
15% Heal and Shield Power

Patronage
Store 15% of the total damage you've dealt to enemies. Whenever this exceeds 333, consume it to heal yourself and your nearest ally for that amount.

443063.name: Eleisa's Miracle
443063.description:
65 Armor
65 Magic Resist
25 Ability Haste

Enduring Vitality

Imbricate Re-roll the stats on Talisman of Ascension. Each time you do so, the stats get stronger. Twice Per Round (Thrice with Apex Inventor).

443069.name: Hamstringer
443069.description:
45 Attack Damage
40% Attack Speed
25% Critical Strike Chance

Scour
On Critical Strike:
  • Apply a bleed, dealing 0 physical damage over 2 seconds. This effect stacks any number of times.
  • Apply a 7% Slow for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 35%.

443079.name: Turbo Chemtank
443079.description:
1100 Health
15% Move Speed

Charged
The strength of movement slowing effects is reduced by 30%.



ACTIVE (0s)
Supercharged
For 4 seconds, gain 80% Move Speed when facing visible enemy champions. When an enemy champion is nearby or after the duration ends, unleash a shockwave, slowing nearby enemies for 50% for 2 seconds.

443193.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate

65 Armor
65 Magic Resist
15 Ability Haste
10% Move Speed

444636.name: Night Harvester

90 Ability Power
400 Health
40 Ability Haste

444637.name: Demonic Embrace
444637.description:
80 Ability Power
600 Health
25 Ability Haste

Sinister Pact
Gain +4% Ability Power per 300 Missing Health, up to 40%.

ACTIVE (0s)

85 Ability Power

55 Attack Damage
350 Health

Spellblade

400 Health
35 Armor

Guiding Light

446671.name: Galeforce
446671.description:
65 Attack Damage
30% Attack Speed
25% Critical Strike Chance
12% Move Speed



ACTIVE (0s)
Cloudburst II
Dash in target direction over terrain, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination. Deals physical damage, increased against low Health targets.

446691.name: Duskblade of Draktharr
446691.description:
50 Attack Damage
20 Lethality
20 Ability Haste

Nightstalker
Your Abilities deal up to an additional percent damage based on the target's missing health. When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, you become Untargetable from non-structures for 1.5 seconds (0s).

446693.name: Prowler's Claw
446693.description:
60 Attack Damage
20 Lethality
20 Ability Haste



  • Sandstrike: After dashing, blinking, or exiting Stealth, your next Attack on a champion deals an additional physical damage. If dealt by a Melee champion, this Attack also Slows the target.

447100.name: Mirage Blade
447100.description:
65 Adaptive Force
60% Attack Speed
12% Move Speed

Blur

447101.name: Gambler's Blade
447101.description:
70% Attack Speed
40 Ability Haste
8% Move Speed

Money In The Bank
Your Attacks and Abilities have a 12% chance to bank between 30 and 245 Gold when they hit an enemy. On Round Win, cash out. On Round Lose, lose 25% of your bank.

447102.name: Reality Fracture
447102.description:
80 Ability Power
40% Attack Speed
300 Health

ZZ'Rot (0s)
On Attack or when damaging an enemy with an ability, summon 3 Voidgrubs to Attack the target. Voidgrubs deal 0 magic damage and live for up to 5 seconds.

When you die, spawn 6.

447103.name: Hemomancer's Helm
447103.description:
60 Attack Damage
30 Ability Haste
10% Omnivamp

Scarlet Allegiance

447104.name: Innervating Locket
447104.description:
70 Ability Power
20 Ability Haste
200 Health

Fill the Soul

At 30 charges, gain 0 Shield, 0 Ability Power, and 0 Move Speed for the rest of the round.

447105.name: Empyrean Promise
447105.description:
60 Ability Power
18% Heal and Shield Power
30 Ability Haste
125% Base Mana Regen



ACTIVE (0s)
Vigilance
Teleport to your ally and grant 0 shield for 5s when landing. Can be used when Ally is downed.

447106.name: Dragonheart
447106.description:
Inner Flame
Increases your Health, Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, Ability Power, Attack Speed, and Ability Haste by 5%, increased by 5% per Dragon Soul you possess.

Every 2 rounds, gain a Dragon Soul.

If you already have every elemental soul, an ancient power awakens within...

When purchased, if it is past round 5, immediately gain 1 soul, plus 1 for every 2 rounds beyond round 5.

447107.name: Decapitator
447107.description:
80 Adaptive Force
50% Attack Speed
12% Move Speed

Attacks and Non-Ultimate Abilities grant stacks. Gain Ultimate Damage and Ultimate Ability Haste per stack.

447108.name: Runecarver
447108.description:
80 Ability Power
20 Ability Haste
8% Move Speed

Helix
Dealing damage with an ability grants 40 Energized stacks and triggers Energized Attacks if it is ready.

Spiral Out
On Energized Attack, gain a Rune stack for the rest of the round. Then fire a missile at the target for each Rune stack, dealing 0 magic damage for each missile.

447109.name: Cruelty
447109.description:
80 Ability Power
30 Armor
30 Magic Resist

Watch Them Fall
On Immobilize an enemy champion, summon a comet above them. The comet lands after 1 second, dealing additional 0 magic damage in the area. This effect has a 6s cooldown per target per spell cast.

447110.name: Moonflair Spellblade
447110.description:
85 Ability Power
400 Health
30% Tenacity

Relentless

When you Attack, reduce your Ability Cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

447111.name: Overlord's Bloodmail
447111.description:
55 Attack Damage
500 Health

Tyranny

Retribution

447112.name: Flesheater
447112.description:
70 Adaptive Force
18 Lethality
18 Magic Penetration

Hack the Meat
Dealing damage shreds 3 Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. Applying stacks has a 1 second cooldown per target.

Cannibalize

447113.name: Detonation Orb
447113.description:
90 Ability Power
12 Magic Penetration
400 Mana
20 Ability Haste

The Bomb
Ability damage marks the target, storing 25% of the damage dealt (increased to 30% against Immobilized enemies).

3 seconds after you last damage the target with an ability, detonate the stored damage on them. If at any point the damage is enough to kill the target, detonate immediately.
